title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL  ENGINEERING TECH
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Chemistry

Technical Drawing

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity

Auto Mechanics

Metal Work

Further Mathematics

Food and Nutrition

Geography
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING/TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Chemistry

Technical Drawing

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity

Auto Mechanics

Metal Work

Further Mathematics

Food and Nutrition

Geography
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ANIMAL HEALTH & PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: FISHERIES TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

title: FORESTRY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work, Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language, Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics or Technical Drawing.

title: HOME & RURAL ECONOMICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in any three (3) of the following:

Government,

Business Methods,

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Any Nigerian Language,

Geography,

Bookkeeping and Principles of Accounts

History,

Clothing and Textile,

plus 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology, Agricultural Science and any other subject.

title: HORTICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work, Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language, Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics or Technical Drawing.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and Mathematics and any three (3) other subjects from:

History,

Literature in English,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Arts,

Government,

Biology

Physics,

Chemistry

Basic Electricity

Geography,

Typewriting,

Commerce/Principles of Accounting.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one (1) subject from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects:
Any three (3) of: 
1. Mathematics
2. Economics
3. Commerce
4. History/Govt.
5. Geography
6. CRS/IS
7. Principles   of 
     Accounts.

title: PRODUCTION TECH.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects of the following Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English Geography, Office Practice Government, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government Typewriting Shorthand

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics
